siteMetadata.name: Nirmal Jasmatiya
siteMetadata.title: Nirmal Jasmatiya | Full-Stack Developer | Generalist
siteMetadata.description: Full Stack Developer based in Bangalore, India.
siteMetadata.about: Master of Computer Applications from AMCEC, VTU. I have 5 years of experience in software development. I will be happy to craft a state of the art product using the following techs: Node, Express, Adonis, HTML, CSS, JavaScript, TypeScript, Vue, React, Angular, MySQL, MongoDB, Redis, GCP, AWS, DigitalOcean, Python, PHP, Laravel, Git, Docker. I am familiar with many others, but these are my favorite. I would always love to expand my knowledge and have hands on other programming languages as well.
siteMetadata.author: @nir_jaz

projects.name: URL short
projects.description: A URL shortener web application based on the AdonisJS Framework. It is an open-source and easy-to-use URL shortener. It allows you to host your own URL shortener, and gives you many useful features.

projects.name: Twitter Helpdesk
projects.description: This app will allow clients to connect their twitter accounts, fetch their tweets and reply to them within the application.

projects.name: Vue Chat App
projects.description: Simple group chat application built with Vue, Socket.io & Adonis JS.
